word: Speaking of the city of God, John continues, "And there shall be no more curse: but the throne of God and of the Lamb shall be in it; and His servants shall serve Him." And then come words which comfort me continually: "They shall see His face; and His name shall be in their foreheads. And there shall be no night there; and they need no candle, neither light of the sun; for the Lord God giveth them light: and they shall reign for ever and ever."
